Posts.Content: Jul 26, 2007 10:27AM kate24 wrote: its called intensity modulated radiation therapy . Its a computerized program that allows the radiation beam to be adjusted for both strength and intensity so that more radiation is delivered to the tumor site and not as much to other healthy tissue.e
Posts.Title: IMRT radiation kate24 lisettemac

Posts.Content: kate24 wrote: Good morning. I have completed chemo and am ready to begin radiation for stage 2 ILC. 1/17 positive nodes. Her's my dilemna, certain molds are needed for this type of radiastion. The molds aren't done and the Doc is suggesting to do the boost first. Has anyone had a similar experience?? thanks in advance for your replies. Kate Log in to post a reply
